attributes.action: To STOP any cover up of the Jersey Case
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the lack of News coming out of Jersey, we would like the Prime Ministers word that there will be no cover up regarding this case and ALL abusers be named if found guilty by a court of Law. Also that no one who gives evidence shall be given a 'Gagging Order' by this Govenment. The truth must come out.
